Name: Coptic textile
Description: Rectangular strip of a plain background textile with linked oval and circular panels of polychrome dyed decoration. The linking strip and border comprises birds and plants on a dark background, the longer oval panel encloses floral motifs, and the circle encloses a depiction of a larger and smaller human figure, the smaller proffering a branch. This is one of a fine set of Coptic textiles from Akhmim acquired in 1888.
